p: As S312 and S416 showed proper half-lives (8.20 h and 9.12 h, respectively, Table S3), they may have less possibility to bring side effects from drug accumulation in the body. In the single-dose acute oral toxicity studies, S312 was well tolerated at the highest dose of 1,000 mg/kg in ICR mice (Fig. S2A and S2B).
